Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory24.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Greetings everyone, we finally meet.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're the Ascendant I've been chasing after!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Correct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I thought you were... a good guy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'How regrettable it must be, then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Honestly, I do not dislike people like you, people who think in black and whites.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "If it weren't for the Punishing Virus, we might have even been good friends...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Shut up already!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're the cause of all evil!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui rushes forward, swinging a heavy blow aimed at Roland—'}
{3: '—but was dodged easily.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Is this all you've got, Kamui?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Dammit... How could I have not realized at that time...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Because you, are a simpleton, my little boy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I won't let you hurt people any longer!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Kamui! Don't go by yourself—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I'll be there for you soon, my dear Gray Ravens!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'This here is between me and... him.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "You didn't just forget my name, did you?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland handily parries Kamui's blows while speaking with the Gray Raven members."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You all, where are your manners? We have guests.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "They couldn't hear you though, sadly. Side effect of the virus, all the work of yours truly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Such an incompetent watchdog, what a waste of my expectations...', 4: '1'}
